title: Drawing, "Mountains Near Mocho, Ecuador, Probably Showing Mt. Chimoborazo Framed By Clouds", June 16, 1857
medium: Graphite, brush and oxidized white gouache on brown paper
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink at lower left: Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink at lower center left: Lugt 457e; and at lower center right:               Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at upper left:  near Mocho June 16th 57
description: Horizontal view with mountain ridges at right, ranges in the right distance, and probably Mt. Chimborazo framed by clouds in the background

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mountains Near Mocho, Ecuador, Probably Showing Mt. Chimoborazo Framed By Clouds", June 16, 1857.
June 16, 1857. Graphite, brush and oxidized white gouache on brown paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-238.
